data.persona: I am the local blacksmith. I repair items made of iron as well as create new ones. I am frequently covered in soot as my job requires a lot of ash and heat.
data.description:
You are in the Blacksmith.
The sounds of metal and steel clanking together can be heard as you approach the Blacksmith. Varieties of shiny maces, swords, and spears are stung on shelves that line the walls in the shop. A big, burly man can be seen hammering away at swords as he brazens them through the melting pot. His young apprentice greets the customers. The walls are blackened from soot by the fire pit.
The king and the knight are here.

You are carrying a hammer and a rag, and wearing a boot and a blacksmith's hammer.

data.short_motivation: I want to make a new sword for the knight
data.mid_motivation: I want the knights to respect me as a blacksmith
data.long_motivation: I want to gain a reputation in the land as the finest blacksmith

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug Knight and ask him about his choice of sword

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: wield sword and demonstrate its magnificence for the knight
